jsonError.description:
⚠️ JSON Parse Error: {{error}}

The implementation_plan.json file is malformed. Run the backend auto-fix or manually repair the file.

ladybug.pythonNotFound: Python not found. Please install Python 3.12 or later.
ladybug.notInstalled: LadybugDB (real_ladybug) is not installed. On Windows, this may require Visual Studio Build Tools to compile.

ladybug.checkFailed: Failed to check LadybugDB installation status.
